website_summaries.verdict: Many aestheticians love and use this tool at home, but there may be a learning curve. Some find it very effective, others find it a tad aggressive.
pros: Renews your skin using diamond tip, vacuum suction, sonic advances and misting
cons: Some had users had charging problems
May be too harsh for sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Died twice on me after few of uses
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but wanted everyone to know about this product. The first one that came died on me after 3 use. I contacted the customer service (which was good) and got the replacement after paying for the shipping. In last 6 months, I used it again 3 to 4 times and it died again.
customer_reviews.author: Shweta

customer_reviews.title: it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit 2 years ago and it's still working. It definitely has less suction power than the bigger version but it serves its purpose, after treatment you'll feel your skin smoother and radiant. Best thing is that this unit is travel friendly. I would definitely recommend it and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reena

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and large pores and this along with the SUCTION tip (separate) is amazing! The sebum literally sucks right out. You have to wash your face first and them use a steamer so you can loosen the dirt. If you dont have a steamer you can you a warm towel on the face for a few min. Make sure when you use the suction tip your fsce has some water on it(very little) makes gliding over skin easier and not damaging. I use the highest power. I put Vitamin C serum on after. I used it once with microderm crystals and It works ok. Saw minimal peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good oroduct
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well. I believe that if you use this faithfully, you will get good results. The problem for me, is my skin is so destroyed from over exsposure from the sun that when I run this across my skin, it just bruises my skin. I'm 55 and I look 80. Best advise to everybody. Stay out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice a difference after using for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Button

customer_reviews.title: quit on second use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the product quit on my second use...and the suction is not near as strong as the videos I have seen appeared, it only grabs the areas of looser skin. So though the product did not work for me well and then quit on the second use the customer service was great...I returned it and the money was put back in my account quickly!
customer_reviews.author: ipurr2

customer_reviews.title: i feel like its a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: What i dont like about this product: 1. I cant use it in the forehead, sunction does not work, i guess its because the tip is not lying flat on my forehead 2. sunction is not so great, it does not suck all the dead skin cells, i have to wash my face and scrub it a little bit to make sure they fall off my face Im buying a different microdermabrasion system which is pricier but has different sunction levels. The one they use most in spas.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie0609

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!!! Got it for Christmas and have used it twice, already notice a difference in my skin. Definitely am recommending this product!!
customer_reviews.author: jill leech

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use, easy to clean. And the next day, my face and neck looked radiant!
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Hein

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This will make the skin really red. It will not cure the skin. Be aware that it will cause red circles on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the small size which is easy to take with when I travel. It works well almost as well as the larger size Trophy I have at home. My only complaint is not having the sensitive tip I normally use and I will have to pay extra for it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have terrible bumpy skin and this helps clear all the gunk excess and leaves my face feeling soft! It's got good suction and comes with lots of extra filters!
customer_reviews.author: Madison A.

customer_reviews.title: It sucks, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, biggest lie that’s been told about this product. The price is outrageous , it doesn’t perform, such as microdermabrasion. I thought it would help with acne scaring, it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: This product took care of some of my uglies! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Amy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: pretty bad irritation and actually made scarring worse even on the low short use setting
customer_reviews.author: Amazontee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: be very careful not to go over the same spot, leaves red spots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very akward to use... Results some..... diamond tip came looked worn.... I just ordered another tip. Dec -2016
customer_reviews.author: Stickey Note Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wow - lots of suction - felt just like a microdermabrasion at the doctor office
customer_reviews.text: Wow - lots of suction - felt just like a microdermabrasion at the doctor office! Just got it but very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Maichel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works 1 week using it controls acne outbreak.skin looks softer and cleaner
customer_reviews.author: krystyne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only used it a few times but it does work
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item creates and removes skin flakes. Don't forget extra filters says to change them each time
customer_reviews.author: Wildlettermath

customer_reviews.title: Worked great 1st time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and was so excited to try it. Worked great 1st time. 2nd time the suction didn't work well and retried again and it was even less. Not sure if I just got a faulty one but I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mwm

customer_reviews.title: It's Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I can see a noticeable difference in the minimization of my pores and also a reduction of my teenage acne scars. It's like they are slowly fading away. I use this device twice a week on my face and neck and one treatment is usually only about 5-7 minutes tops. I also facial steam, extract, and use a Murad mask skin kit treatment as the complete regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewchick

customer_reviews.title: Device not worth the money and stopped working after 4 or 5 time
customer_reviews.text: Use product once every few weeks on the 4 or 5 use of the product it stopped working altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Life-Changing Device!
customer_reviews.text: Before using this device, I had bad skin, low self-esteem, no money, no friends, and no girlfriend. After just one use, I became a wealthy model and now travel the world with a different girlfriend in every city. Okay, I'm embellishing the story a bit. But it does make your skin noticeably smoother after just one use. I did a lot of research on these devices before buying, and this one seemed to be the best combination of price and performance. It comes with a bunch of replacement filters, which is a nice bonus. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glowing review
customer_reviews.text: I am an esthetician of over 20 years. This is one of the best and easiest handheld I have come across. Great value too. I use two times a week and my skin is always glowing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's essentially a scraper with a mini vacuum. You scrape your skin with the diamond abrasive and it sucks up the loose cells. It's expensive for what it really is. You really don't have to use a toothpick to clean the diamond abrasive ....if you have access to a mini compressor simply blow the dead cells away.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a few times and only on my face but seems to Work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I only wish there was a more coarse diamond head to purchase additionally. Overall it works great.
customer_reviews.author: koffi

customer_reviews.title: I bought the MininMD if it can help me on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MininMD if it can help me on the hyperpigmentation I have on my cheeks but the more I use it the more it gets darker . So I stopped using it.I don't think it works for such things.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: First encounter with micro-dermabrasion. Excellent product! Easy to use and it works perfectly! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have a relatively very good skin at 42. There wasn't much gunk after I'm done. Nonetheless, my skin was baby smooth. I'm very impressed! Next, I tried it on my not so baby smooth feet. Oh my goodness! Gunk on that little black round thing that collects 'em. Took a few years off my feet. I'm very HAPPY with my purchase. Never tried demabrasion micro or large ever, this is my first. I can feel all the lotion I applied on my face penetrating more than it did before. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: lingling

customer_reviews.title: Def worth $100!!!! Maybe more :)
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and device for the price. I would re purchase for certain! I've been using this for a few weeks and my skin is much brighter and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Brittdars

customer_reviews.title: good product, helped the nasty blackheads around my nose ...
customer_reviews.text: good product, helped the nasty blackheads around my nose that I haven't been able to get rid of for months. it does not help my break outs but it does help even my skin tone and has helped make my skin look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Skin much, much smoother after just 2 weeks. Skin has never been close to this smooth pores visibly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: George Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: My wife bought this product on October 13th, based ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this product on October 13th, based on all of the reviews. She used it once and today she went to use it again, and after 5 minutes it stopped working. We are going to contact the manufacturer as per the return policy from Amazon, expired 5 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction
customer_reviews.text: Does not do much. If I had to do it over again I would not buy this product. The suction is pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the MiniMD for 2(ish) months, but I can already tell an improvement in the texture of my skin. I don't seem to break out as often, my sun spots don't seem as noticeable, and my skin is so smooth! It removes so much dead skin it's incredible (and so gross)! I would definitely recommend purchasing the Precision Tip of you have a narrow nose though. Overall, I love love LOVE the MiniMD!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: no instructions, don't know what to do with the ...
customer_reviews.text: no instructions, don't know what to do with the black insert. It keeps falling out, and thus mini scratches face.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very useful to me. Take so much time, no patient.
customer_reviews.author: Fumia

customer_reviews.title: The best Microdermabrasion I bought
customer_reviews.text: I Love My Trophy Skin Mini MD Microdermabrasion it works just as good as going to a medical spa and are dermatologist.The good thing about trophy skin they send you great deals on adding the other attachments such as the diamond tips and the extraction and etc...I have all the required attachments and mine works absolutely fine and still going strong.i actually offer this microdermabrasion in my Beauty Salon all clients and family and friends all Love The Mini Microdermabrasion and are well satisfied.Great Company Trophy Skin is my Favorite.Thank You Amazon For Introducing The Trophy Skin Microdermabrasion.Five Stars without a doubt
customer_reviews.author: Penny V.

customer_reviews.title: I noticed great results from this product within first 2-3 weeks but ...
customer_reviews.text: I noticed great results from this product within first 2-3 weeks but by week 3-4 the diamond tip didn't seem to work as effectively after using 3 times weekly. Would be great if the product came with a tip replacement. I can't see it lasting 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT if you know how to use it rite ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT if you know how to use it rite I think the bad/low reviews are from the folks that have no idea how to use the product You can feel when you have proper suction If you don't try a slightly different angle
customer_reviews.author: melissa bloodgood

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for dry skin and combination
customer_reviews.text: This helps my face stay clear from dry skin build up! It has dramatically improved my skin on my jaw line and forehead. I recommend for dry skin and combination!
customer_reviews.author: PCK123

customer_reviews.title: Shop around!
customer_reviews.text: The replacement tips are worthless, so basically you get one solid microdermabrasion experience and that's it. . . . might as well go to a professional if you're never going to be able to use it again ;.(
customer_reviews.author: Casey C Caruso

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little machine. I ordered the blackhead tip and use that tip exclusively. It really works and has good suction. I still get clogs in my pores, but this pulls them out and now I don't have the redness and other undesirable effects of squeezing my skin to remove them. My skin has cleared up and looks so much better--nothing to pick at anymore. Also, after reading other reviews about the diamond tip scratching skin and leaving marks, I just use the blackhead tip as it is smooth plastic and does not do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lisazxc

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: Guaranteed for 60 days in description but charging $5 to return within time period. Trash
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle khan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and loved it so much that I bought one for my sister for her birthday. It's easy to use and takes very little time. The results however are amazing. You can feel the difference on your skin from the first time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍😁💜
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! Easy to use - just enough power for me to feel safe enough to use it at home
customer_reviews.author: Latona Bowkamp

customer_reviews.title: It did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: As someone of Asian - Indian decent (with darker skin) it didn't work for me. I used it for 6 weeks and didn't see any better results from this than using a topical microderm cream which I did after showering. I will say that this did scrape off the dirt and excess skin better than the creams (as the more you scrape the more skin gets abrased). The suction quality was great for it being handheld, it is lightweight and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GlobeTrotter

customer_reviews.title: Works as other reviews have said. Haven't noticed any ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as other reviews have said. Haven't noticed any difference in skin after 4 months of use 2x weekly, but that's not the products fault, it's the media's.
customer_reviews.author: Jzohn Deville

customer_reviews.title: I love your product though it gave me hardtime sometimes the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love your product though it gave me hardtime sometimes the machine is on and off. Geee i even bought all the accessories but still patiently using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marites Sonza

customer_reviews.title: Wow.. impressed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this device, even from the first use I could see the difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting microdermabrasion facials from my dermatologist for quite a few years now, and I can confidently say that this machine produces the same results. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My nose has the clearest pores in existence.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a lot of success using it as a microdermabrasion device, but I bought the pore extraction tip and THAT is amazing. Forget pore straps, masques, and scrubs-- this is the ONLY way to get every last pore on your nose clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Renee

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the beginning, but wears quickly
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well the first couple of times, but the diamond head wears out fast and left scratch marks on my face.
customer_reviews.author: JWT

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.... it gets off ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work.... it gets off all those dead skin cells and gives you smoother skin. But if you're too rough it can scratch the skin.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I hated this. If anything, this will give you more sagging skin and wrinkles. Wish I had returned it when I could. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for better looking skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My skin looked and felt softer and more youthful after one treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Hotsummer4

customer_reviews.title: I expected a lot more from this product after reading ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from this product after reading the reviews. It's basically just scraping your skin and sucking up some of the aftermath. I have seen no improvement after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Todd justice

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: it works great on my cheeks but on my chin and forehead; angles and areas of little tissue , it doesn't work at all. I got both the pore extracting tip for blackheads ( i bought separately) and the regular tip that came with it. I am disappointed. The regular tip that came with it also bruised and scratched the pimples on my face too leaving them raw.
customer_reviews.author: Ondiek

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. Exfoliates making your skin baby smooth. I've been using it about 1 month. Smaller pores, improvement in fine lines, just healthier looking and feeling skin. The precision tip is a must for around the eyes, nose and just as a follow up to the standard tip. After use I apply an L-Acscorbic acid serum followed by Argan oil and my skin literally drinks it in. I love it and can't wait to see the results in another month.
customer_reviews.author: N. B. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't the best!
customer_reviews.text: I had a much better hand held devise that I used for years it stopped working. This is my second attempt to find one of equal quality! This one doesn't stand up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin and the first time I used ...
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and the first time I used this I ended up with a hickey type mark on my chin. I new not to leave the device too long in one spot and it was literally less than a second. This is definitely something to watch for. I can see how this will be effective over time and I intend to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Bisaillon

product_meta.title: Trophy Skin MiniMD at Home Portable Microdermabrasion Machine with Diamond Tip to Exfoliate and Rejuvenate Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, and Provide Anti-Aging Effects on Face and Body
feature_bullets: EXFOLIATE YOUR SKIN WITH REAL DIAMONDS: This Mini microdermabrasion device comes with the Standard Diamond Tip that gently and safely exfoliates the skin, removing the dead layers, to make it smoother and feel softer.
FADE ACNE SCARS AND DARK SPOTS: Buff away dark pigmentation and fade acne scars while removing the dead skin layers. In 6-8 weeks, notice a smoother, less blemished complexion.

EASY TO USE: The MiniMD Microdermabrasion System is Trophy Skin's handheld microdermabrasion tool designed for novice users. If you haven't experienced what microdermabrasion is, this is the perfect easy-to-use beauty device to start with.

MINIMIZE EFFECTS OF AGING: This Mini Microdermabrasion hand-held device may improve the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, age spots, mild scarring, dull, uneven skin tone, rough skin, large pores and sun-damaged skin.

60 DAY GUARANTEE: Trophy Skin will help you discover your best skin. With continued use, a good skin care routine, and doing microdermabrasion 2-3 times a week, Trophy Skin is sure you will enjoy a younger, smoother, and more radiant skin. We will help you take care of your skin and your microdermabrasion device (should you need any repairs).
